INSERT ALL INTO EASYWORK.MAIL VALUES (SEQ_ENO.NEXTVAL, #{reserveYn}, DEFAULT, NVL(TO_DATE(#{sendDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE) , #{cancelDate}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{stateCode}, #{typeNo}, DEFAULT) INTO EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO VALUES (SEQ_ENO.CURRVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{toMail}, #{fromMail}, #{ccMail})
INTO EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_ENO.CURRVAL, 'M', #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL B ON A.MAIL_NO = B.MAIL_NO
A.TO_MAIL = #{mailEmpNo}
A.FROM_MAIL = #{mailEmpNo} AND B.RESERVE_YN = 'N'
A.FROM_MAIL = #{mailEmpNo} AND B.RESERVE_YN = 'Y' AND B.STATE_CODE IN('EP', 'CN')
(A.TO_MAIL = #{mailEmpNo} OR A.FROM_MAIL = #{mailEmpNo})
AND B.STATUS = 'N'
AND B.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.MAIL_NO, D.TYPE_NAME, B.EMP_NAME, A.TITLE, SUBSTR(A.CONTENT, 1, 15) AS CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DATE, E.CHANGE_NAME FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE B ON B.EMP_NO = A.FROM_MAIL AND B.ENT_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL C ON C.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.TYPE D ON D.TYPE_CODE = C.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT E ON E.CTG_NO = C.CTG_NO AND E.REF_NO = C.MAIL_NO AND E.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE A.TO_MAIL = #{toMail} AND C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT A.MAIL_NO, D.TYPE_NAME, B.EMP_NAME, A.TITLE, SUBSTR(A.CONTENT, 1, 15) AS CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DATE , E.CHANGE_NAME, DECODE(C.RECEIVE_CHECK, 'Y', '읽음', '읽지않음') AS STATE_CODE FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE B ON B.EMP_NO = A.TO_MAIL AND B.ENT_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL C ON C.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.TYPE D ON D.TYPE_CODE = C.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT E ON E.CTG_NO = C.CTG_NO AND E.REF_NO = C.MAIL_NO AND E.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE A.FROM_MAIL = #{fromMail} AND C.STATE_CODE = 'FN' AND C.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.RESERVE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY C.SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT A.MAIL_NO, D.TYPE_NAME, B.EMP_NAME, A.TITLE, SUBSTR(A.CONTENT, 1, 15) AS CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DATE, E.CHANGE_NAME , C.STATE_CODE, F.STATE_NAME FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE B ON B.EMP_NO = A.TO_MAIL AND B.ENT_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL C ON C.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.TYPE D ON D.TYPE_CODE = C.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT E ON E.CTG_NO = C.CTG_NO AND E.REF_NO = C.MAIL_NO AND E.STATUS = 'Y' LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL_STATE F ON F.STATE_CODE = C.STATE_CODE WHERE A.FROM_MAIL = #{fromMail} AND C.RESERVE_YN = 'Y' AND C.STATE_CODE IN('EP', 'CN') AND C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.SEND_DATE DESC

SELECT A.MAIL_NO, DECODE(A.TO_MAIL, #{toFromMail}, '수신', '발신') AS STATE_NAME, A.TITLE, SUBSTR(A.CONTENT, 1, 15) AS CONTENT , TO_CHAR(C.SEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DATE, E.CHANGE_NAME FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE B ON B.EMP_NO = A.TO_MAIL AND B.ENT_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL C ON C.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT E ON E.CTG_NO = C.CTG_NO AND E.REF_NO = C.MAIL_NO AND E.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE C.STATUS = 'N' AND (A.FROM_MAIL = #{toFromMail} OR A.TO_MAIL = #{toFromMail}) ORDER BY C.SEND_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE EASYWORK.MAIL SET RECEIVE_CHECK = 'Y' WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND RECEIVE_CHECK = 'N' AND STATUS ='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT A.MAIL_NO, C.TYPE_NAME, A.TITLE, B.SEND_DATE , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = TO_MAIL AND ENT_YN = 'Y') AS TO_NAME , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = FROM_MAIL AND ENT_YN = 'Y') AS FROM_NAME , A.TO_MAIL, A.FROM_MAIL, A.CC_MAIL, A.CONTENT, D.CHANGE_NAME, D.ORIGIN_NAME, D.FILE_PATH FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL B ON B.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.TYPE C ON C.TYPE_CODE = B.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT D ON D.CTG_NO = B.CTG_NO AND D.REF_NO = B.MAIL_NO AND D.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE A.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT TO_CHAR(EMP_NO) AS CC_MAIL, EMP_NAME AS CC_NAME FROM EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO IN( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(#{ccMail}, '[^,]', 1, LEVEL) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 5)

SELECT A.MAIL_NO, C.TYPE_NAME, A.TITLE, B.SEND_DATE , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = TO_MAIL AND ENT_YN = 'Y') AS TO_NAME , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = FROM_MAIL AND ENT_YN = 'Y') AS FROM_NAME , A.TO_MAIL, A.FROM_MAIL, A.CC_MAIL, A.CONTENT, D.CHANGE_NAME, D.ORIGIN_NAME, D.FILE_PATH FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL B ON B.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.TYPE C ON C.TYPE_CODE = B.TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.ATTACHMENT D ON D.CTG_NO = B.CTG_NO AND D.REF_NO = B.MAIL_NO AND D.STATUS = 'Y' WHERE A.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND B.STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.*, B.SEND_DATE , (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_ID, '@easy.co.kr') FROM EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = TO_MAIL) AS TO_ID , (SELECT CONCAT(EMP_ID, '@easy.co.kr') FROM EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = FROM_MAIL) AS FROM_ID , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = TO_MAIL) AS TO_NAME , (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EASYWORK.EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = FROM_MAIL)AS FROM_NAME FROM EASYWORK.MAIL_INFO A LEFT JOIN EASYWORK.MAIL B ON B.MAIL_NO = A.MAIL_NO WHERE A.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
